description.@en: It is through the weaving that I am able to catch a glimpse of what is to come.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever a game session begins, roll 3D6 Chaos Dice. For every die that lands on face ‘6,’ place an additional Coin into your respective pool. Whenever they are spent, they are immediately discarded for the rest of the game session.
